body_html:
We cannot accept this PR because it assumes a fixed length when calculating the log_crf. The current approach uses dynamic_rnn for the reason that the max_seq_len is probably *not* known at graph build time, and varies from step to step.
…

the log_crf.  The current approach uses dynamic_rnn for the reason that the

body:
We cannot accept this PR because it assumes a fixed length when calculating
the log_crf.  The current approach uses dynamic_rnn for the reason that the
max_seq_len is probably *not* known at graph build time, and varies from
step to step.

On Mon, Dec 12, 2016 at 5:25 PM, Martin Wicke <notifications@github.com>
